name: ParagonOS
description:
Thank you for choosing ParagonOS!     This package contains the following: - Amazing gameplay focused on dodging and attaching while listening to awesome music! - An interesting story full of lore featuring multiple endings. AND MANY MORE! Controls: - WASD - Movement - Right Click - Knife Throw - Space - Sharp Flower - E - Teleport - LShift - Superposition Songs Credits: Veorra: SOUNDCLOUD: http://www.soundcloud.com/veorra
